subject: Re: Putting the rugs online and "A perfect match"
preview: @heath just gonna close this one. I have emailed here on a different ticket.

full_threads.body: @heath just gonna close this one. I have emailed here on a different ticket.

Hi Joel,

Okay, no worries. That sounds great - thanks! I'll wait to hear from you when they're ready.

Kind Regards,

Katie Turner

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Katie, 

Thanks for this, I can see you have update the product information for the rugs. It's now over to us to make the required changes in the backend of the site. We will be working on it this week and then likely will make it live over the weekend to minimise any users/stylists being logged in. We need to do it in this way to manage any stock that is already allocated.

Hi Heath,

I just wanted to check how it was going transferring all the rugs across? I've only got two more days in the office before I finish up in my position so I would love to be able to handover the new system to my replacement if possible. Let me know if I can do anything else to help. Thanks heaps.

Kind Regards

Katie + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO HUNTLEY + CO

E. HELLO@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AUP. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Great, thanks Katie, 

We will check it out and let you know if we need anything else at this stage.

Hi Heath,

I've just finished loading all of the rugs as products on the website. I've just attached a spreadsheet of all of the rugs in the current system.

I've just put all of the old SKUs next to the new product name so that we can transfer them over. We are not going to transfer over any that have been Sold, Retired or Unaccounted for so you can just skip past those ones.

Let me know if you need me to do anything else or want me to reorganise them into a different list so that so that it's easier for you to load them.

Thanks heaps.

Kind Regards,

Katie Turner

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Okay that's great - thanks. I will work through loading them all now and then let you know once they are ready to be moved across.

Kind Regards,

Katie Turner

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Katie, 

Yes, we will make the rugs stay in their relevant 'status' e.g. repair bay. All good.

Hi Heath,

That's super helpful thank you! I think that all makes sense now. Just one question - when we transfer them over will they all still stay in the same category? e.g. if you manually move a rug SKU that is in the repair bay will it stay there?

Kind Regards,

Katie Turner

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Katie, 

I have recorded a quick how to video for you: https://www.loom.com/share/2d9e76f4be3f459d97a442e35023de4a

I'm also more than happy to have a call to clarify any points.
@heath Can you help me with this?

Hi Joel,

That sounds great! Would you possibly have a minute to call and talk me through how that would work just so I'm making sure my process is all correct?

Kind Regards,

Katie + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO HUNTLEY + CO

E. HELLO@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AUP. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Katie,

Here is a solution we could do. You can go ahead and start creating a new rug products and then send us a list of existing sku that needed to be moved to a new product. And we will be the ones to move the sku to appropriate product manually.

Hi Heath,

Thanks so much for that. I was just having a look through the video and wondered if there was any way we could covert our current SKUs instead of putting in new ones? We have the current codes written multiple times on every rug so re-writing codes would be having to cross-out every pre-existing code already on there. I was always thinking through how new codes would work with the rugs that are currently out - would we have to delete each code off the order and allocate a new one?

Kind Regards,

Katie Turner

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Amy and Katie, 

Apologies for the delay we have been prepping this as we need to make sure the live orders are unaffected. 

Good news is that we are ready for you to load the products in. The process for the rugs will now be exactly like any other product, but here is a quick video in case: https://www.loom.com/share/6c91de3615eb4542861608033e08601d

Once the rugs are loaded in, let us know and we run through the final step to officially make them 'normal' products.

Hi Heath,

I hope you are well.

Just checking if we have any updates on putting the rugs online? Katie is finishing up in a couple of weeks so we would like to get cracking on this soon.

Thank you!

Kind Regards

Amy Smith

AMY SMITH CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Heath,

That looks great! Thanks so much for that - I will start working through that and let you know if I have any questions.

Kind Regards,

Katie Turner

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Amy and Katie, 

Here is a quick video to show you how to assign the perfect match products:
https://www.loom.com/share/e710cf4970ef49d9a84c76d10dc0058e

We are working on the new rug setup and will have another video over to you early next week : )

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig
Joel Maligalig assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Lovely to chat today!

Can you please keep Katie (cc’d) and I updated on where we are at with the rugs and “A perfect match”. Katie is working from home 2 days a week at the moment and this is a great project for her to work on before she finished up with us in a couple if weeks.

I look forward to hearing what the next steps are to get these 2 projects underway!

Thank you.

Kind Regards
Amy Smith

AMY SMITH
CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR
E. AMY@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU <mailto:amy@huntleyandco.com.au>
P. 02 8310 2285 <tel:%200283102285>
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU <https://huntleyandco.com.au/>


From: Katie Turner <katie@huntleyandco.com.au <mailto:katie@huntleyandco.com.au>>
Date: Thursday, 22 July 2021 at 3:24 pm
To: Amy Smith <amy@huntleyandco.com.au <mailto:amy@huntleyandco.com.au>>
Subject: Rug Project

Hey,

Just wanted to let you know I have just about finished a full stocktake of all of the rugs and making sure everything is correct and up to date in the system. There are a few rugs that are unaccounted which I think have inevitably been damaged or become missing along the way. Most of them are all of our oldest rugs though!

Let me know how you go trying to sort out if we are going to put all of the rugs online. I’m happy to take on that project and try and get it all set up when it’s ready to go.

Kind Regards,
Katie Turner

E. KATIE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU <mailto:amy@huntleyandco.com.au>
P. 02 8310 2285 <tel:0283102285>
W.
